briefdescription.para: Apply this graph update object whenever a graph is rescanned.
Apply this graph update object on start.
Use the convex hull (XZ space) of the points.
Lock all points to Y = lockToYValue.
if lockToY is enabled lock all points to this value
Minumum height of the bounds of the resulting Graph Update Object.

detaileddescription.para: Useful when all points are laid out on a plane but you still need a bounds with a height greater than zero since a zero height graph update object would usually result in no nodes being updated.

briefdescription.para: If enabled, set all nodes' tags to setTag.
Set to true to set all targeted nodese walkability to setWalkability.
Penalty to add to nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Be careful when setting negative values since if a node get's a negative penalty it will underflow and instead get really large. In most cases a warning will be logged if that happens.

briefdescription.para: Points which define the region to update.
If modifyTag is enabled, set all nodes' tags to this value.
See modifyWalkability.
Update node's walkability and connectivity using physics functions.

detaileddescription.para: For grid graphs, this will update the node's position and walkability exactly like when doing a scan of the graph. If enabled for grid graphs, modifyWalkability will be ignored.
For Point Graphs, this will recalculate all connections which passes through the bounds of the resulting Graph Update Object using raycasts (if enabled).

briefdescription.para: Use world space for coordinates.

detaileddescription.para: If true, the shape will not follow when moving around the transform

briefdescription.para: Private cached convex hull of the points.
Has apply been called yet.

detaileddescription.para: Used to prevent applying twice when both applyOnScan and applyOnStart are enabled

briefdescription.para: Private cached inversion of setTag.
Apply the update.

detaileddescription.para: Will only do anything if applyOnScan is enabled

briefdescription.para: Updates graphs with a created GUO.

detaileddescription.para: Creates a Pathfinding.GraphUpdateObject with a Pathfinding.GraphUpdateShape representing the polygon of this object and update all graphs using AstarPath.UpdateGraphs. This will not update graphs directly. See AstarPath.UpdateGraph for more info.

briefdescription.para: Inverts all invertable settings for this GUS.

detaileddescription.para: Penalty delta will be changed to negative penalty delta. setWalkability will be inverted. setTag will be stored in a private variable, and the new value will be 0. When calling this function again, the saved value will be the new value.
Calling this function an even number of times without changing any settings in between will be identical to no change in settings.

briefdescription.para: Lock all points to a specific Y value.
Draws some gizmos.
Draws some gizmos.
Draws some gizmos.
Called right after all graphs have been scanned.

detaileddescription.para: FloodFill and other post processing has not been done.

simplesect.para: Since OnEnable and Awake are called roughly in the same time, the only way to ensure that these scripts get this call when scanning in Awake is to set the Script Execution Order for AstarPath to some time later than default time (see Edit -> Project Settings -> Script Execution Order).

briefdescription.para: Recalculate convex points.

detaileddescription.para: Will not do anything if not convex is enabled

briefdescription.para: Do some stuff at start.
Switches between using world space and not using local space.

detaileddescription.para: Changes point coordinates to stay the same in world space after the change.

briefdescription.para: Helper class for easily updating graphs.

simplesect.para: graph-updates for an explanation of how to use this class.
